nodes.title: Scribal Lab - Manuscripts & Hermetic Calligraphy
nodes.summary: Recreate rubricated manuscripts with parchment, oak-gall ink emulation, and calm goldleaf.
nodes.safe_use: Muted palettes; no high-contrast black/white; slow gestures; no flicker.
procedures: Lay parchment ground; draw faint baselines at 6-8% opacity.
Set body text (EB Garamond) at gentle gray; rubricate initials in vermilion.
Apply goldleaf overlay to margins/initials; keep shimmer static (ND-safe).

numerology.rationale: Scribe node opens the 72-letter Shem ha-Mephorash cycle; reduction 9 anchors completion.

astrology.rationale: Moon in Taurus supports steady, tactile calligraphy rituals.

pedagogy.learning_outcome: Learners construct rubricated folios while practicing trauma-aware pacing.
pedagogy.rationale: Stages keep control in the learner's hands; undo paths highlighted at every step.

nodes.title: Pigment Lab - Ultramarine, Vermilion, Malachite, Gold
nodes.summary: Layered glazes emulating historical pigments in ND-safe color discipline.
nodes.safe_use: Digital emulation only; avoid neon; build 3-5 thin glazes.
procedures: Accents: vermilion sparingly; gold overlay < 10% area.
Export 16-bit TIFF master; create 2048px PNG preview.

numerology.rationale: Thirty-three layers frame the glaze sequence; reduction 6 grounds harmony.

tarot_angelic.rationale: Empress cultivates pigment gardens; Seven of Cups reminds learners to pace colour choices.

astrology.rationale: Venusian earthiness keeps glaze building sensuous yet measured.

crystal_color_geometry.rationale: Crystals echo pigment minerals; octagon geometry balances four-colour glaze rotations.

pedagogy.learning_outcome: Learners mix and layer digital pigments while documenting sensory thresholds.
progressive_disclosure: Stage 4: reflective critique with opt-out prompts
pedagogy.rationale: Color work can overwhelm; journaling and opt-outs keep the lab ND-safe.

nodes.title: Geometry Lab - Vesica, Hexagram, Rose 12, Golden Rectangle
nodes.summary: Exact constructions for cathedral geometry; parametric and ND-safe.
nodes.safe_use: Calm lines; no fast animation; exact math (no eyeballing).
procedures: Vesica: centers separated by radius r; stroke width 6-10px.
Hexagram: 6 points at 60 deg; draw two equilateral triangles.
Rose 12: petals at 30 deg increments; keep petal symmetry clean.
Golden rectangle: subdivide by phi; optional quiet spiral.

numerology.rationale: One hundred forty-four segments map the vesica lattice; reduction 9 affirms completion.

tarot_angelic.rationale: Temperance balances geometries; Ace of Swords clears mental focus for constructions.

astrology.rationale: Solar clarity with Saturnine discipline keeps compass work precise.

crystal_color_geometry.rationale: Crystals amplify light through geometric grids; frequency 963 Hz signals crown clarity.

pedagogy.learning_outcome: Learners draft layered sacred geometries with compass and code, documenting each construction step.
pedagogy.rationale: Sequenced reveals keep geometry approachable and allow pausing between layers.
